author: By Sebastian Murphy-bates For Mailonline, Martin Robinson and Tom Payne For The Daily Mail
title: Estranged husband charged with murder of wedding planner and daughter
description: Christopher Boon, 28, has been charged with the murder of Laura Boon, 31, nee Mortimer, and her daughter Ella Dalby, 11, after they were found dead at a house in Gloucester.
